name: Traditional Wild Flower Confetti
description:
The plants in our confetti are all naturally dried, un-preserved, un-scented, un-dyed and have been harvested from sustainable sources. Wild Flower Floral’s Confetti will biodegrade within a few days.

BLUE MALLOW - hope and happiness
BUTTERCUP - prosperity
DAISIES - simplicity and innocence
HONEYSUCKLE -  fidelity 
LAVENDER - purity and fertility
MARIGOLD - constancy in love
ROSE PETALS - love and passion

*Please note there maybe seasonal variations in the ingredients.

All our confetti is packed by hand at our home in Dorset so slight variations in size may occur.

CONFETTI:
Height 10.5cm, Width 7cm, Depth 3.5cm, label size 5x5cm

POSTAGE (UK): 1 item  £2.00 - 10 items £3.25 - 15 items £3.75 - please enquire for larger orders

name: Herbal Tea (Sereni-Tea)
description:
LIME BLOSSOM - Tilia europa, traditionally used to soothe anxiety.

CHAMOMILE - Matricaria recutita, traditionally used to relax the body.

SKULLCAP - Scutellaria lateriflora, is reputed to quieten the noise and clutter in the head giving a clearer focus. 

This tea may be useful for the overworked, exhausted and insomniacs.

*If you are pregnant or already taking anti depressants, tranquillisers or sedatives consult a health care professional before considering using this tea.

SERVING INSTRUCTIONS
The heavier herbs make their way to the bottom of the bag, in order to get the full benefit of the blends give the bag a good shake and dig deep when serving . Add one heaped teaspoon full to a cup of boiling water, cover for 5 minutes, strain, sweeten with honey if needed and enjoy.

TEA: 27g

POSTAGE (UK): 1 item  £2.50 - 10 items £3.75 - 50 items £18.75
